name: The Dreamworks Movie 'Shrek' Quiz | Movies | 15 Questions

questions.text: What kind of creature is Shrek?

questions.explanation:
Fiona & Princess Fiona.

	Voiced by Cameron Diaz.

questions.text: What happens to the Princess every night?
What is Lord Farquaad's capital city called?

options: He doesn't want to marry her

questions.text: When the Princess asks him, what kind of knight does Shrek say he is?

John Lithgow & Lithgow.

questions.text: What does the blind mouse think Shrek's ear is?
What does Shrek say as he runs into the church to stop Farquaad and the Princess's wedding?
When the dragon eats Lord Farquaad, what does she spit out?
Is the dragon a boy dragon or a girl dragon?
questions.explanation:
Girl & Girl dragon.

	She falls in love with the donkey.

questions.text: Which of the following lines is NOT said by the donkey?
options: 'You don't know what it's like to be considered a freak! ... Well, maybe you do.'
questions.explanation:
'Dead broad off the table!'.

	This line is said by Shrek as the Seven Dwarves push Snow White onto the table.

questions.text: Who 'rescues' the Princess from Shrek while in the woods?
questions.explanation:
Robin Hood.

	Here, Robin Hood is an annoying French guy.

questions.text: And the last question, who wrote the book that this movie is based on?
options: No one -- it wasn't based on a book
questions.explanation:
William Steig.

	William Steig is a writer of children's books.  He also wrote "CDB!" and "CDC?", books in which the sounds of the letters and numbers make words and phrases.
